item.description:
This will be a very special night for EDEMG! Barcelona is custom-made for EDEMG - with an extensive wine list and many, many small plates (tapas), the stage will be set for a wonderful evening of food, drinks and conversation!

There isn't much I want to say about Barcelona - I'd rather have you check out their website and see for yourself why I thought scheduling an event at Barcelona was a "no-brainer!"

Please note the variety of selections, including many VEGETARIAN options!



http://www.barcelonaw...

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: A taste of Spain - Wine and Tapas at Barcelona in West Hartford!!!
